data.title: Lee Hyeri - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Lee Hyeri: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

South Korean singer and actress best known as the youngest member of Girl's Day. She is also notable for her television career, which includes roles in the SBS shows Tasty Life and Hyde, Jekyll, Me, and in the MBC program Real Men.

Before Fame

She and her sister stayed with her grandmother mainly as her mother would go to work. After studying at the Seoul School of Performing Arts, she entered the film program at Konkuk University.

Trivia

In 2013, she had an eight-month relationship with H.O.T. boy band member Tony An. She has a sister two years younger than her.

Family Life

She and her sister grew up in Gwangju, South Korea. Since 2017, she has been dating her Reply 1988 co-star Ryu Junyeol.

Associated With
